dialog.dialogText: Who me? ...Are you talking to me?
The end times are here, you should be focusing on yourself not talking to strangers.

options.text: End times? What are you talking about?

dialog.dialogText: I'm talking about the creatures that enter our realm every night.

options.text: Oh yes...I've seen them also. Tall mysterious creatures.

dialog.dialogText: Yes, I belive they are tied to an old legend of an entity outside of our realm capable of infinite destruction.
The kind that wants to eat our reality and bring it into the void. Perhaps it is trying to get through to our world.
I don't know. It's only a legend after all. Some pieces have gone missing throughout time.

options.text: Well then what are you able to tell me?

dialog.dialogText: The legend states that the ruler of the void conquered time itself with 12 generals. Perhaps it is using them once again to conquer our realm.

options.text: How can I find them and destroy them?

dialog.dialogText: The legend states that the ruler of the void conquered time itself with 12 generals. Perhaps it is using them once again to conquer our realm.
If the legend is real, then this piece of armor may come in handy. It has been in my family for generations.

options.text: And you're just going to give it to me for free? Right?

dialog.dialogText: If I wasn't so dead serious right now you might have made me laugh. No, you will need to bring me a sample of an enderman...for research.
Just some flesh and blood...if those things even bleed at all. Go slay one and return to me with your sword.
